type.name: org.gradle.api.Named
type.description: * Types can implement this interface and use the embedded {@link Namer} implementation, to satisfy API that calls for a namer.

method.name: getName
method.description:
* The object's name. *

* Must be constant for the life of the object. * * @return The name. Never null.

property.name: name
property.description:
* The object's name. *

* Must be constant for the life of the object. * * @return The name. Never null.
